enum: Reserved for future amendment of navigational status for HSC
Reserved for future amendment of navigational status for WIG
AISNavStatus.title: AISNavStatus

vendor.description: The name of the system vendor
vendor.title: Vendor

vendorMinimumDistanceToTargets.description: Minimum distance in meters that the system will keep to other Vessels
vendorMinimumDistanceToTargets.title: Vendorminimumdistancetotargets

vendorCriticalTcpa.description: If the projected CPA is less than minimumDistanceToTargets, and TCPA falls below criticalTCPA, a new manoeuver should be calculated
vendorCriticalTcpa.title: Vendorcriticaltcpa

vendorManoeuverDelay.description: Time given in seconds to the navigator / system, before the proposed manoeuver is no longer able to be excecuted
vendorManoeuverDelay.title: Vendormanoeuverdelay

vendorAutomaticManoeuverAcceptanceTime.description: If automatic maneuver acceptance is enabled, the new route will be activated after a specified number of seconds
vendorAutomaticManoeuverAcceptanceTime.title: Vendorautomaticmanoeuveracceptancetime

timeSeriesData.description: Time series data from the system
timeSeriesData.title: Timeseriesdata

time.description: Date and Time of the event
time.title: Time

time.description: Date and Time of the predicted value `ISO 8601` format `YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ`
time.title: Time

targetShips.description: list of target ships detected by the CAGA system
targetShips.title: Targetships

internalStatus.description: Dictionary containing additional internal  information about the system (health, status..)
internalStatus.title: Internalstatus

additionalProperties.description: The 'data' field can include additional properties. All additional properties should be DataPoint objects.

value.description: the value of the data at the current timestep
value.title: Value

mBeforeLegChange.description: meters before the waypoint to start interpolating to the new value
mBeforeLegChange.title: Mbeforelegchange

mAfterLegChange.description: meters after the waypoint to finish interpolating to the new value
mAfterLegChange.title: Mafterlegchange

sog.description: Initial ship speed over ground in knots
sog.title: ship speed over ground

cog.description: Initial ship course over ground in degrees
cog.title: ship course over ground

colregRulesApplied.description: COLREG rules the system is applying to the vessel. Each item in the list must be of type `int` corresponding to the COLREG rule number
colregRulesApplied.title: Colregrulesapplied

distanceToTarget.description: Calculated distance from the own ship to the target vessel
distanceToTarget.title: Distancetotarget

tcpa.description: calculated time to closest point of approach in seconds
tcpa.title: Tcpa

predictions.description: List of predicted future values. This can be used to store data like a predicted path for each target vessel. The `value` field supports both numbers and objects
predictions.title: Predictions

airTemperature.description: The air temperature in degrees Celsius
airTemperature.title: Airtemperature

waterRemperature.description: The water temperature in degrees Celsius
waterRemperature.title: Waterremperature

significantWaveHeight.description: The significant wave height in meters
significantWaveHeight.title: Significantwaveheight

sog.description: Initial ship speed over ground in knots
sog.title: Initial ship speed over ground

cog.description: Initial ship course over ground in degrees
cog.title: Initial ship course over ground

static.description: Static ship information which does not change during a scenario.

waypoints.description:
An array of `Waypoint` objects. Each waypoint object must have a `position` property.
If no turn radius is provided, it will be assumed to be `0`.
Additional data can be added to each waypoint leg. This allows varying parameters on a per-leg basis, such as speed and heading, or navigational status
waypoints.title: Waypoints

time.description: Date and Time of the predicted value `ISO 8601` format `YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ`
time.title: Time

ShipStatic.description: Static ship data that will not change during the scenario.

length.description: Length of the ship in meters
length.title: Length

width.description: Width of the ship in meters
width.title: Width

height.description: Height of the ship in meters
height.title: Height

shipType.description: General ship type, based on AIS

ShipStatic.title: ShipStatic

sog.description: Initial ship speed over ground in knots
sog.title: ship speed over ground

cog.description: Initial ship course over ground in degrees
cog.title: ship course over ground

timeSeriesData.description: TimeSeries data originating from the Simulator
timeSeriesData.title: Timeseriesdata

time.description: Date and Time of the predicted value `ISO 8601` format `YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ`
time.title: Time

time.title: Time

vendor.description: The name of the system vendor
vendor.title: Vendor

static.description: Static ship information which does not change during a scenario.

waypoints.description:
An array of `Waypoint` objects. Each waypoint object must have a `position` property.
If no turn radius is provided, it will be assumed to be `0`.
Additional data can be added to each waypoint leg. This allows varying parameters on a per-leg basis, such as speed and heading, or navigational status
waypoints.title: Waypoints

title.description: The title of the traffic situation
title.title: Title

description.description: A description of the traffic situation
examples: Crossing situation with 3 target vessels in the Oslofjord
description.title: Description

startTime.description: Starting time of the situation in `ISO 8601` format `YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ`
startTime.title: Situation starting time

turnRadius.description: Orthodrome turn radius as defined in RTZ format
turnRadius.title: Turnradius

data.description: A `Data` object that includes `speed`, `course`, and `heading` data points

description: #### This is a JSON schema for result data originating from Collision and Grounding Avoidance systems

creationTime.description: Date and Time that this file was created, in `ISO 8601` format `YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ`. This should be the simulation end time.
creationTime.title: Creationtime

trafficSituation.description: The traffic situation that was simulated (input file). This should remain unmofidied.

cagaData.description: Data generated by the system under test (auto-navigation / collision and grounding avoidance system) during the scenario.

simulationData.description: Data generated by the simulator duirng the scenario

title: Test Output Schema
